channel.title: [317] Interface [317]
channel.description:
I added the green person with the thumbs up for the friends list instead of the smiley face. so i edited the smiley face to make it look like the green one. but now it shows both of them like this
[URL=http://img696.imageshack.us/i/beforey.png/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/5672/beforey.png[/img][/URL]
But once i click on it, it looks normal, like this
[URL=http://img519.imageshack.us/i/afterk.png/][IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/3448/afterk.png[/img][/URL]
Anyone know how to fix it so the smiely face is gone?

item.title: [317] Interface [317]
item.dc:creator: @LOLBanned LOLBanned
item.description:
@LOLBanned wrote:

You are retarded. If you had any sence you would alter your class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 and load all new 562 sprites from a new location to the correct positions. To fix your childish mistake, remove the sideicon of your friends tab, it isnâ€™t that hard.
